name: RHS Oyster Farming
description:
This game was created as the community outreach portion of the RHS Class of 2017's Senior Seminar, Aquaculture group.

Oysters are natural filter feeders, and putting them in polluted waters can greatly help to improve water quality. By instituting several oyster farms at Rocky Hill, we can not only clean up the water, but also educate students on the importance of environmental protection.
